text: Værløse Basket, also known as the Værløse Blue Hawks or VBBK, is a professional basketball team based in Horsholm, Denmark.= The team plays in the Basketligaen, the highest tier of basketball in Denmark. ==Honours== *Basketligaen **Runners-up (1): 2000–01 ==Season by season== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%;text-align:center" |- bgcolor=#CADCFB ! Season ! Tier ! League ! Pos. !
